thread.section_title: Hotel Scalinata di Spagna - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice hotel on the perfect location
thread.title_full: Nice hotel on the perfect location - Review of Hotel Scalinata di Spagna, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Maas T
title: Nice hotel on the perfect location
text:
We have stayed for a week in this hotel, which had the perfect location if you want to visit al the highlights of Rome. The hotel is located near the subway station Spagna. The staff of the hotel was friendly and helpfull. The room was clean and had a cozy ambiance.
We would recommend this hotel to everyone!
